demographics: Generation that grew up with RuneScape, Diablo, World of Warcraft, Stardew Valley
pain_points: Need for relatable entry points into web3
Lack of emotional connection to crypto

problems_validated.problem: Crypto adoption is difficult without emotional connection
problems_validated.market_gap: Lack of nostalgic, relatable entry points that evoke powerful emotions

products_tools.name: Axie Infinity
products_tools.use_case: Nostalgic gaming experience that introduces people to crypto
products_tools.metrics: One of the largest play-to-earn games

products_tools.name: Rabbit Hole
products_tools.use_case: Earn tokens by learning about decentralized applications
products_tools.pricing: Example: 10 UNI tokens for completing Uniswap quest

business_strategies.strategy: Use nostalgia as emotional hook to drive crypto adoption
business_strategies.implementation: Create gaming experiences that evoke powerful emotions from childhood games, then attach crypto to those emotions
business_strategies.expected_results: Get people down the crypto rabbit hole in a way that makes sense to billions of gamers
business_strategies.case_study: Axie Infinity targeting gamers who grew up with RuneScape, Diablo, World of Warcraft

business_strategies.implementation: Companies pay users tokens to learn about their protocols through educational quests
business_strategies.expected_results: Acquire vetted customers who understand the product and have on-chain reputation
business_strategies.case_study: Uniswap giving 10 UNI tokens for completing learning quest about their protocol

problems_solutions.problem: Crypto adoption barriers due to lack of emotional connection
problems_solutions.solution: Use gaming nostalgia as emotional bridge to crypto

startup_ideas.target_market: Job seekers and employers in web3 space
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Trustless verification of skills and experience
startup_ideas.validation: Apply for jobs and get hired within 60 seconds based on on-chain credentials

startup_ideas.business_model: Blockchain foundations pay for course completion
startup_ideas.validation: Pay developers 1 ETH for completing Solana or Ethereum coding course

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Proposing on-chain resumes without considering implementation challenges
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Thousands of people providing negative feedback
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Better research implementation details before public proposals
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Jiho's thread about on-chain resumes getting significant backlash

growth_tactics.tactic: Target specific gaming communities with nostalgic experiences
growth_tactics.results_expected: Mass crypto adoption through emotional connection

metrics_kpis.benchmark: Vetted customers who understand the protocol
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Ensure educational content leads to actual protocol usage

trends_signals.trend: Play-to-earn gaming as natural progression of gaming industry
trends_signals.opportunity: Bridge traditional gaming to crypto through emotional connection
Companies paying users to learn about their products/protocols
Trustless verification of skills and experience

actionable_quotes.quote: Nostalgia is the most powerful of human emotions
actionable_quotes.context: Discussing how to make crypto relatable through gaming
actionable_quotes.actionability: Use nostalgic elements in product design to create emotional connection

actionable_quotes.quote: When you can basically evoke that emotion and then attach crypto to it right you have a way to get people down the rabbit hole
actionable_quotes.context: Explaining Axie Infinity's approach to crypto adoption
actionable_quotes.actionability: Create emotional hooks before introducing complex technology

key_statistics.context: Target market size for crypto gaming adoption

meta.title: From Community Manager to C-Suite | Jiho, Axie Infinity
